articles.title: 'Shows our need for growth': Bruins send Maple Leafs into break with a reality check - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: If there was any doubt that the Boston Bruins would run away with top seed in the Atlantic and a coveted home-ice advantage in the Division of Death, that idea was vanquished by the visitors’ 5-2 thumping of the second-seeded Toronto Maple Leafs on Wednesday.
